TopicTitle: My landing gear fell into the under-kerbin

Articles.Content:
System Info

KSP Version: KSP2 Build ID 10624168

Operating System and version: Windows 11 / Version 22H2

CPU and GPU models: AMD 5800X / NVIDIA RTX 3700 / 32GB RAM

Mods Installed: None

Description of the Bug

Expected Behavior: Crashing my vehicle would destroy my vehicle

Observed Behavior: The game decided my landing gear (or some similar shaped piece) was the craft and it fell into the under-kerbin which is the only way I can describe it. There is a full second world shaded in a deep blue buried under an ocean buried under the KSC runway. Watch my recording and you'll understand

Steps to Replicate: Crash?

Fixes / Workarounds: Revert

Recording of behavior: https://imgur.com/a/O6sX8qr
